snippet.title: Drakan: The Ancients' Gates PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Drakan The Ancients' Gates PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: January 28, 2002
Platforms: PlayStation 2
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
TC Offset X: 380
TC Offset Y: 0
_____________________________________________
Requested by: budaroddy
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
